game.name: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
game.shortDescription: Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza! As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza! As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.

reviewHighlights.text: 내가 싸움만 잘했어도 저 망할 오르골 내 손으로 짓뭉갰음 ㄹㅇ
